name: Bibimbap
description: A bowl of warm white rice topped with sauteed vegetables, sliced meat, a fried egg, and gochujang or soy sause.

name: Bulgogi
description: Grilled thin meat slices marinated with various condiments such as soy sauce and pear juice.

name: Japchae
description: Chewy stir-frying boiled glass noodles mixed with spinach, onions, beef, and soybean sauce.

name: Mandu
description: Korean dumplings filled with pork, cabbage, chives and Korean glass noodles.

name: Kimbob
description: A rice roll wrap made with cooked rice and ingredients such as meat and vegetables rolled in seaweed.
